welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Highland, where breathtaking mountain vistas and charming small-town charm await you. Known for its outdoor activities and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Barstow-Daggett Airport, with gates for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ryan Field Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport houses ticket counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apple Valley Airport serves domestic flights to and from various cities in the United States.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Apple Valley Airport caters to private jets and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
